vignette.name: Customizing the Max Environment
vignette.bodytext: Once you begin to work with Max you will want to take advantage of the many ways you can configure the environment to match your working style.

ul.li: Set up collections of colors for objects using the Object Defaults window.
Optimize performance for your specific application using scheduler preferences.
Add your own content to avoid repetitive tasks, such as templates, clippings, and prototypes.
